name: Granbury Hangman
description:
"Granbury Hang Man" is a free, publicly available 2D Hangman game designed for the PC (soon to also be available on smartphones) - all words relate in one way or another to Granbury and Texas. Megan Ehrhart and Knut Hybinette led the project as an opportunity for Tarleton Digital Media students to work on a pro-bono game design as a silly suppliant to the Granbury Video Game project. The game was donated to the Hood County – Granbury Media Board.

dia Board.  http://granbury.org/

If there is any questions. Feel free to contact khybinette@gmail.com

Donations will go towards scholarships.
